pageProduct.name: Olay Luminous Whip Face Cream Moisturiser 50g
pageProduct.description:
Information

Feel a Light as Air Finish in a Flash

Delightfully Whipped

Finally, all the power of a heavy cream whipped to airy perfection. Ten years in the making, this breakthrough weightless Whip formula is light as air without compromising the potency.

Light as Air Finish

Skin is left with a smooth, matte and shine-free finish that doesn't feel sticky or greasy. The light as air finish makes this moisturiser the perfect primer to help makeup set and stay throughout the day.

Rush of Absorption

This innovative moisturizer, with Active Rush Technology, transforms from cream to liquid on contact, flash absorbing and delivering a rush of brightening ingredients and hydration that lasts all day.

What is Active Rush Technology?

Unique Structure

Whips with Active Rush Technology features a unique three-dimensional structure that delivers potent ingredients and intense hydration in an airy, weightless form. This breakthrough technology gives your skin these benefits without the frustrating tradeoffs.

Matte Moisture

The Active Rush Technology instantly leaves skin feeling light, dry and soft-not greasy or slick. This powerful technology even works throughout the day to keep skin feeling smooth and matte, helping banish that 3pm shine.

Hold and Release

Its innovative hold and release delivery system holds 1000x its weight in hydration and active ingredients. When this Whip moisturizer is applied to your skin, it instantly releases the powerful hydration and actives for immediate absorption.

General Information

Olay Regenerist Luminous Whips Face Cream Moisturiser evens tone & reduces pores without greasiness. Light as air texture. 8 hour shine control. Lasting radiance without shine.

Features:
- Breakthrough Whip moisturiser delivers powerful skincare with a light as air finish

- 8 hour shine control with matte finish, instantly hydrates and primes skin for all-day makeup wear
-  Light as air texture. 8 hour shine control. Lasting radiance without shine
- In 2 weeks, evens skin tone & reduces appearance of pores. In 8 weeks, significantly reduces appearance of spots
- Exclusive Active Rush Technology actively holds & releases 1000X its weight in hydration
- Uniquely whipped formula with Pearl- Optics Technology (Inositol, Vitamin B3) Oil-Free. Non-Greasy. Absorbs instantly. Will not clog pores

Size: 50g

KEY FEATURES

• ACTIVE MOISTURISER
TONE & PORE PERFECTING
• Controls shine & gives matte finish, even after 8 hours
Skin feels light & smooth all day long
• Instantly hydrates & primes skin for all-day makeup wear. Light as air texture. 8 hour shine control. Lasting radiance without shine.
• In 2 weeks, evens skin tone & reduces appearance of pores
In 8 weeks, significantly reduces appearance of spots
• TECHNOLOGY
• Exclusive Active Rush Technology actively holds & releases 1000X its weight in hydration
• • Uniquely whipped formula with Pearl- Optics™ Technology
(Inositol, Vitamin B3)
• Oil-Free. Non-Greasy. Absorbs instantly. Will not clog pores.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. Important information, do not discard outer carton.

Ingredients

Water, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Isohexadecane, Isopropyl Isostearate, Dimethicone, Stearyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Sodium Polyacrylate Starch, Cetyl Alcohol, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Inositol, Behenyl Alcohol, Dimethiconol, PEG-100 Stearate, Fragrance, Cetearyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Alcohol, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, BHT, Disodium EDTA, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Zinc Gluconate, Magnesium Aspartate, Copper Gluconate

Directions

Smooth evenly over your cleansed face and neck morning and evening.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
